content.rendered: Cool and soothe your skin with After Sun Cooling Lotion, made with Aloe Vera, Cucumber and Peppermint. Light and non-greasy formula which absorbs quickly while replenishing lost moisture after sun exposure. Enriched with antioxidants from aloe vera to help repair sun damage and skin irritation, and natural emollients from coconut oil for extra moisturisation. Lather up with after sun lotion today for a fresher tomorrow.

excerpt.rendered:
A little too much fun in the sun? We’ve got you covered!

  • PABA and Paraben Free.
  • Australian owned and made.
